title: Chef (2014 film)
summary: Chef is a 2014 American comedy-drama film written, co-produced,  directed by, and starring  Jon Favreau. Favreau plays a chef who, after a public altercation with a food critic, loses his job at a popular Los Angeles restaurant and begins to operate a food truck with his young son.
